questions.question: Andi is 165 cm tall. Donna is 167 cm tall. So, Donna is ________________ than Andi.
Comparative adjectives are used when comparing ________________ things, people or groups.

Which is the comparative form?
 "I'm strong, but my brother is ________________ ."

Choose the correct degree of comparison in the following sentence.
 Of all the hurricanes in American history, Hurricane Katrina is probably the ________________ .

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 The raven may be SMARTER than all other birds since it is very adaptable.

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 They are LIGHTER than most animals because their bones are hollow.

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 One of the FASTEST flying birds is the peregrine falcon.

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 Some people think it is LEAST ATTRACTIVE of all birds.

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 Some would say that birds are the MOST MUSICAL of all animals.

What is the degree of comparison for each adjective in capital letters?
 When it cannot find a FAVORITE food, it will learn to eat something else.
